front.title: HTTP Version Translation of the Capsule Protocol

abstract.t: This draft specifies how HTTP intermediaries can translate the Capsule Protocol between HTTP versions. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-kb-capsule-conversion/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/bemasc/capsule-conversion.
